subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Despite a crash and 30-foot slide with only a half-mile to go, a bloodied Denis Menchov beat Italy’s Danilo Di Luca by 41 seconds over all in the century-old Giro d’Italia.
snippet: Despite a crash and 30-foot slide with only a half-mile to go, a bloodied Denis Menchov beat Italy’s Danilo Di Luca by 41 seconds over all in the century-old Giro d’Italia.
